Thank you for the A+ grade on our staff - I will be sure and pass this along to the entire team!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights with our 2-year old. The King Suite was huge and fun for her to play in. My special requests were all granted so I was pleased. The main complaint I have is that there was no bathtub. My daughter was scared of the shower because she never used one before so for all 3 nights she was terrified. For little kids a shower-only bathroom is not a good option.  The pool and spa were good sizes. It was always crowded though. One afternoon there was a group of over a dozen adults sitting and a dozen boys diving in the pool and tossing balls around. It was dangerous for my child. None of the parents said a word to their unruly kids.  Breakfast was OK. The same items were served for all 3 days we were there. Check-in and check-out were very fast.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments!  My apologies that you did not have a suite with a bathtub, as we do have them in select rooms.  Hopefully we can welcome you back soon - thanks!

Summary: My husband and I spent a weekend here while hosting a baby shower for friends.  I was incredibly sick, but the man (Dante) working the front desk was incredibly friendly and made me feel right at home.  We had a room at the end of the hall and it was spacious with a huge stand up shower.  There was also a full kitchen with an oven.  We stocked up at the Target and were set.  Breakfast was tasty downstairs, staff was kind, and I didn't have any trouble getting a late check out.  The platinum gift was a really nice touch, but honestly - THE STAFF MAKES THIS HOTEL GREAT!  Location is near some restaurants and a Starbucks.  Easy freeway access.  We were all over the place and it was easy to get around.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing such terrific comments about our hotel and staff!  I was happy that Donte was able to make you feel comfortable and at home (I hope you are feeling better!).  The entire team hopes to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Just completed a one week stay at this property and I was very impressed. The hotel appears to be relatively new. The rooms were very clean and spacious. The location is convo enemy just off 55. The staff was helpful and professional. Great pool area and plenty of room to relax outside. Absolutely one of the best residence inns I've stayed in. Would definitely recommend this location if you are in the area. You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: We appreciate staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments!  I was delighted that you were able to enjoy the pool and outdoor area.  Hopefully we will see you again soon!

Summary: My family of four has stayed at this property for four months. Over that time you are able to learn a lot about a hotel. What has impressed us so much is the quality of people that are employed here. Dante is amazing to us and has become a friend. Everyone at the front desk has been a pleasure and we chat and say hi multiple times a day. My children run down the hall to give Miguel hugs. He always takes time out of his busy day to talk to my kids. We all like him a lot.They wave and yell hello by name to Dante, Miguel, and others when they see them. Miguel's also a master at the grill on BBQ night. Blanca, who services our room is special and goes above and beyond for us. Pilar was exceptional. From the management, to service, to engineering, we can't say enough about the staff
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your long term stay and sharing your wonderful comments!  We have an amazing team and I am happy you were able to connect with most of them.  Thanks again for staying and be sure and keep in touch!

Summary: Stayed here on business in a 1 BR suite. Well thought out floor plan although kitchen downsized from other Residence Inns I have stayed, everything is new. Bathroom bright and clean. Nice lobby, breakfast area, firepit and gym. Donte' front desk was outstanding and helped me with a number of issues during visit. Highly recommend this Residence Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your recommendations!  We also appreciate your wonderful feedback about Donte, and I will be sure and share with him.  Thanks again for staying and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I stayed at the hotel sometime ago using a special rate for travel agents.  The rate was very reasonable and I booked the reservation for 2 mounths.  Within the first 3 weeks of my stay there I was informed the rate that I have was only valid for a certain number of days (6 days to be exact).  They decided to tell me they changed the rate via email, which I had no access to at the time not pick up a phone and let me know personally.  I would assume they were trying to avoid any sort of confrontation.   The only reason I rate this hotel as average because the hotel is nice so is the room.  The only thing that needs some modifying is lack of service when it comes to overall treatment of their customers.  I can't in good conscience recommend this hotel due to the possibility they
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments about your recent stay.  I apologize for the misunderstanding regarding the Travel Industry rate, and the resulting incovenience you experienced.  The Travel Industry rate offers a 50% discount from the hotel's rack rate.  Since this is a considerable discount, the hotel is only able to offer this for a maximum of six nights.  Again, I am sorry you were not aware of this, and I appreciate your patience and understanding.  Thank you again for sharing your feedback.

Summary: Staying at this property 21 March, I found the appearance to be nice and fresh, the bed was comfortable and the decor was top notch.  Since it is a newer property the first impression lived up to what I expected.  The staff member at the front desk on Friday evening was the same person that worked it on Saturday morning.  He was friendly and on Saturday morning, I witnessed him handle a situation with poise and professionalism.  A couple had went out to eat breakfast on the outer patio and left their two children inside to "play" on the computers in the public area for the guests, taking the "residence" part of the property a bit too far.  When the undisciplined girls spilled orange juice all over the keyboard, the staff member came over and assisted while taking control of the
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing your comments.  My apologies for the issues you experienced with the Internet service.  The Tiered Internet offering provides the guest a choice between the improved base service, or an option to pay for even greater speed.  The base level accommodates needs for typical e-mail, Internet surfing and social media use, while enhanced High Speed is designed for the more intensive user, for transferring large files, streaming, etc.  In any event, it sounds as though something was not working during your stay with us.  I am sorry this was the case.   I hope you can give us another chance, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We have stayed here twice since the opening of this new all suite Marriott property.  We really like the clean, spacious rooms and its proximity to Honda Center, Angels Stadium and downtown Tustin.  They have full kitchens with all the necessary accessories, i.e., wine opener and wine glasses.  The bathroom is spacious and large.  The shower is completely glass enclosed and very posh. The towels are good quality.   There is plenty of closet space with nice hangars.  Parking is plentiful and free (always a plus). wifi is fast and also free.  Starbucks and Subway are next door (in the same parking lot).  It's also nice having a little store next to the front desk and you can charge the items to your room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us twice and sharing your comments!  We are delighted that you enjoy the rooms, hotel amenities, and location.  We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My family and I travel to So. Cal several times a year. Tried this hotel when it was only a few months old. After first night, pulled the sheet back due to a smell, looked like blood on the mattress pad. After getting new bedding an a apology, my 3 year old found a whiskey bottle under the bed, 1-2 oz. left and a Apology from housekeeping and 1 free night. Followed up the following February and used Marriott rewards points to stay a second tome(figured the staff would not make same mistakes) shame on me. Late night after Huntington Beach marathon. Arrived late, kids in roll out and my wife and I in bed. Several day stay for Disneyland, early out and late in. No housekeeping required. Last day looking for socks, etc., pulled back sheets to reveal multiple stains on bedding.
Manager Response: We appreciate that you chose to stay with us in order to give the hotel a second chance.  I am, however, disappointed that you did not have a pleasant experience.  I am sorry for the issues you experienced with housekeeping, and the overall level of responsiveness.  I have been in communication with Marriott Customer Care regarding your stay, as it is our goal to ensure this has been resolved.  Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, nice amenities, nice staff
Summary: A little difficult to find from the 55 since it seems to be in a GPS "Bermuda Triangle." I think the area must have some new streets. The hotel sends email directions to help out. If you look for the Fairfield Inn that is in the same parking lot, that may be easier.  We found the first floor room by the pool and basketball court to be very loud -- well, the guests were loud -- probably more distracting than noise from the 55 would have been. The hotel did seem to enforce the 10pm closing time for the basketball court and pool.  As others suggest, get a high floor room on the street side, unless easy access to the pool is more important to you than quiet.   There is a Starbucks and a Subway sandwich shop in the parking lot.
Manager Response: We appreciate the comments about your recent stay!  My apologies for your "Bermuda Triangle" experience, but I was happy to hear the pre-arrival email with directions helped you find your way.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I arrived at 10:00 pm and left the following morning, but wish I could have spent more time at this hotel. The rooms were very spacious, the breakfast very good and the staff very friendly. The hotel's proximity to Orange County airport is very convenient.
Manager Response: Wow, sounds like you had a very quick stay with us!  We hope to have you back for a longer visit to enjoy more of what the hotel and surrounding area has to offer.  Thank you for staying and we look forward to seeing you return!

Summary: This residence inn is absolutely fantastic. I booked a studio for my family and I for a disneyland trip. And the room was spacious, right size kitchen. It does not have a full oven (just for those who need one) but it has and electric stove top with 2 burners for light cooking. The room was fresh, clean wonderful for the value. The bed was comfy and I admire they have vent air conditioning and heating. The TV was a great size. My favorite had to be the bathroom. The vanity is so beautiful. It has a moderb fresh taste look. No tub but it has spacious stand in shower. Breakfast was good. Had plenty of options. Red skin potatos, eggs, hash, plus soo much more. Very filling. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Over all my stay was excellent!! Slept perfectly the only issue for
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and naming Residence Inn as your favorite brand within Marriott!  I was also happy that you loved the guestroom bathroom...that is also my favorite part of the room!  Thanks again for staying and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: New hotel, very sharp, loved the room
Summary: This hotel looks great!  The lobby is very attractive and the room was modern and well appointed.  We stayed in a one-bedroom suite, a little larger than their studios.  The bathroom had a surprising amount of storage and the shower was very large.  The kitchen was well-equipped.  The breakfast was well-stocked, tasted good, with a lot of variety.  I was treated very well by the staff who were quick to acknowledge my status w/ Marriott (hey, not too many Marriott properties do this - after a lot of years of loyalty, it's a big deal for me).  I would definitely stay there again in a warmer season to enjoy their pool.  It is located right on the freeway so there's some noise - can't be helped, it's an extremely busy freeway.
Manager Response: Many thanks for staying with us and sharing your comments!  We appreciate your continued loyalty to Marriott, and I am delighted you were recoginzed for this during your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon so you can enjoy our outdoor experience!

Summary: Beautiful property that makes you want to just hang around.  Nice pool/hot tub, gorgeous seating area with a glass fire outside as well as BBQ grills, and an elegant lobby.   The breakfast was elevated by the offering of eggs, sausage and potatoes along with your usual suspects (yogurt, fruit, cereal, waffles, bagels, toast, english muffins and pastries).  Their waffle bar was elevated by the extra toppings offered (whip cream, strawberry sauce, chocolate chips and caramel sauce). The staff kept the food well stocked and there was ample seating.  The wi-fi was free and worked excellent.   The rooms were superb.  Clean, comfortable, roomy and state of the art.  The desk had a power strip on it (no moving furniture or crawling around for plug ins).  TV had 50 or so channels. The
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you so much for staying with us and taking the time to write such a terrific review!  It sounds like you really enjoyed everything the hotel had to offer, as well as the surrounding area.  Thanks again, and hopefully we get to see you again soon!

Summary: I spent three night here and the hotel was great. The place is very new and the hotel staff was great. Just about every night there was a manager reception which were basically a meal.  Highly recommend for a family visit to the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments!  I am happy to hear you enjoyed our evening reception - we have also started Karaoke every other Wednesday, so hopefully you can join us for that!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Reached at midnight hotel after long drive. Confused with entrance and parked at back. Went in with someone who stay in hotel.  Staff asked me how to get in instead greeting. I realized that i entered back door then. System down. waited for 15min and staff called me and checked in very dry mood. Maybe i was too tired and made make a mistake to enter improper door. But, marriott never treated me this way.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments about your stay.  My sincere apologies for the lack of service you received upon check-in.  We will definitely review this with the front desk and ensure our committment to service is demonstrated at all times.  Again, I apologize, and I hope we can welcome you back soon.

Summary: My wife and I had a four night stay here and was pleasantly surprised with our experience.  Being that the hotel is practically new (not even on Google street view yet!) it was beautiful and even smelled new!  The staff for the most part was very friendly and helpful with the exception of one particular front desk clerk who seemed uninterested in her job, other than that it was a great overall experience. The rooms were very modern with all the amenities of home and then some.  The breakfast was served in the lobby every morning and was fresh and well stocked all the time.  There was so much that we didn't check out in the hotel (like the hot tub, pool, outdoor firepit, etc...) but just the experience and central location will bring us back again. Being I do a lot of driving
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and being pleasantly surprised!  The hotel has been open since August 1, 2013, and we have been working with Google Maps to ensure an accurate listing.  We hope you can make it back soon, and experience more of what the hotel has to offer.  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Disneyland, Joe's Italian Ice, Shopping, oh my!!!
Summary: The three of were very comfortable and enjoyed our stay in Tustin. We visited Disneyland, had an enjoyable experience while having Italian ice at a very busy establishment right down the street from Disneyland! Shopping mecca in Tustin for any budget is a real thrill, when seeking that bargain of the season!! The hotel was clean, decent offerings for breakfast and the room was great. Though we were there for two nights, it was a very nice experience!!!
Manager Response: Oh my!  Sounds like you had an amazing visit to Southern California - I will have to check out Joe's Italian Ice!  Thank you for the wonderful review.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon, and hopefully you get to stay for more than 2 nights!

Summary: My family of 4 stayed there for 5 nights during the holidays. SInce we're allergic to animals, the staff was gracious enough to find a room that had not been used by pets. Loved the modern decor, clean rooms, kitchenette with fridge and microwave, free wi fi, hot breakfast and only ten minutes to Disneyland. They were short staffed during our stay so we had to get towels and such ourselves at the front desk. And that did not include hand towels unless you asked for them.One night, the cleaning staff left us with no towels. Otherwise,I would definitely come again.
Manager Response: Many thanks for staying with us and sharing your comments!  My apologies for the missing towels, I will definitely share with the team.  We are always looking for ways to improve, so your feedback is a big help.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Just stayed 2 bedrooms 2 bath unit in the 4 the floor. One bedroom has king bed and large bathroom, other room has queen bed. Guest bathroom is good size and shower, no bathtub in the unit.   Full kitchen has stove with 4 burner with oven, mini dishwasher. There were no kitchen towel and oven mitt or dishwasher detergent, sponge to wash the dishes. There was pots and pan and dishes, silverware, cookware.   Housekeeping was ok, they didn't throw our kitchen trash away or few spots left in the floor etc., but overall beautiful clean new hotel.   Ralph's, CVS near by and other mall nearby has brand new Target and Whole Foods. This Whole Foods has large dining area and perfect for easy meal. Drive through Starbucks is next to the hotel.   We drove to Disneyland twice. It's about
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments about your recent stay!  My apologies for the missing items in your kitchen - the items you mentioned are standard, so I will share with our housekeeping team.  I was happy to hear you were able to enjoy a visit to Disneyland.  Keep us in mind when you return to the area, we would love to welcome you back!

Summary: i am having a great time here!  i recently became disabled and am traveling with my partner; this is truly my home away from home.  i am so grateful to miguel, pilar, dante, delia, karen, and others for helping me along the way!
Manager Response: You are awesome and thank you for the positive comments!  We enjoyed getting to know you and your group over the last couple of months.  Everyone at the hotel misses you already!  Enjoy a wonderful holiday and hopefully we will get to see you again!

Summary: I travel to Orange County for business and had never stayed here as it is a new hotel.  I stayed for one night and the stay was excellent.  Very clean, large room - almost like a small apartment really.  Very modern in style.  Staff was very pleasant.  The food at happy hour you could really make a meal out of - if you wanted too.  The night I was there it was pasta with sauces, garlic bread,  salad and brownies for dessert.  The morning meal was fine - hot and cold items.  The hotel is convenient to John Wayne Airport (about 5 mins away), and neighboring cities such as Costa Mesa and Anaheim.  Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for trying us out and for the wonderful review!  I was happy to hear you enjoyed our Social Hour - we are mixing up the food choices and have found that pasta is one of our favorites!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We stayed in this hotel for a week during our trip to Disneyland. The location is very good, right next to freeway. It was a little hard at first since our GPS on the rental car couldn't locate this hotel since it's brand new...but that's not a big deal. It's just 10-15mins drive to Disney, 10mins drive to Irvine, for some yummy Asian food, and not too far to drive to the beaches.  We love the modern design of the hotel, the bathroom has a shower room instead of a tub, that's a huge plus for us. The kitchen is very well designed and convenient for us as well. We loved the free breakfast~The most important is, our 4 years old enjoyed this stay. however, there's a few cons I want to mention: 1. Refrigerator is loud. (not continuously thou) 2. We were not on the high way side,
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments and delighted that your 4-year old enjoyed the hotel!  We also appreciate your feedback and will share your comments with the team.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Would have been a 5/5 if cleaner
Summary: Stayed just 1 night at beginning of October and the rooms are spacious and modern and I would stay there again, despite there being a slight issue with cleanliness, as the microwave had not been cleaned since the last person had used it. Also the crockery left a bit to be desired as we had to check 2 mugs before we found a clean one.  This was mentioned to the front desk at check out and was the only issue we had - and hopefully just an initial opening blip on their part.   Everything else was perfect: FREE Wifi, good breakfast, all mod cons and good location/price for our needs whilst passing through the Los Angeles area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback, and my sincere apologies for the cleanliness issues.  I will certainly address these with our housekeeping team.  We hope to welcome you back to Tustin soon!

Summary: Stayed at this new Residence Inn on a Saturday night. Beautiful modern design in rooms and public spaces.  Very nice staff.  Only open since August of 2013.  In a business park area near highways.  Many restaurants within short driving distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  You mentioned nearby restaurants and I wanted to mention that the Subway and Flame Broiler restaurants will also be opening soon.  Please come back and give them a try - we would love to welcome you back!

Summary: Beautiful contemporary design, pool, fire pit, rooms, lobby, etc. No complaints. Nice to be greeted when returning from a day out by, "Welcome Home."  All of the positives written by everyone, all true. Would return and recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your terrific comments and feedback!  We look forward to "welcoming you home" again soon - thanks!

Summary: Comfortable rooms, spacious layout, spa-like bathroom decor.  Patio with table top fire place, outdoor living room-style patio furniture, swimming pool and Jacuzzi.  This hotel should be a model to follow for other hotels of this class.  Loved it.  Oh, did we mention the staff? super nice, smiling and helpful at all times.  Thank you!
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and got to experience "outdoor California living" by staying in one of our patio suites.  Our entire team looks forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This hotel opened this summer.  It has an elegant, contemporary design.  If is Beautiful and clean.  Breakfast is included with lots of choices. (a few healthy choices)  Service was very good.  Location is convenient to freeways in all directions.  I want to return again soon
Manager Response: We want you to return soon!  Thank you for your positive comments and I was delighted you enjoyed the healthy choices at breakfast.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: I don't always stay at hotels, but when I do I prefer Marriott Residence Inn. This is a new hotel with a desirable apt design. I could live here. The location was optimal, just seconds from 55 onramp going east and minutes going west, yet we never were bothered by freeway noise. The hotel seemed to be teeming with guests and the staff never missed a beat. They were calm, helpful, and friendly.  Of course the room was clean and the pool had good shade later in the day. Breakfast was more than adequate, just as I count on from Marriott. I would stay here again (and again).
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and again, for staying with us. We‚Äôve been very thankful for the response to our hotel openings and we are glad to meet the need. We look forward to serving this area with all of the extra amenities offered at Residence Inn for a long time. Until we see you again....THANKS!

Summary: First impressions. Don't be put off by the freeway. We were on the freeway side but could hardly hear traffic noise. Rooms are brand new and very contemporary. Everything is new. Check in was easy and quick. Reception service awesome. The young lady who helped me book a shuttle was fantastic. ( her name started with G, I think Geraldine, so sorry I didn't take more notice as you were so very helpful) Overall for our first day it's been great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback. I will let Genevieve know that she‚Äôs doing an awesome job - our associates make the difference!   Also, we‚Äôre glad that you appreciate every room is equipped with double paned windows. Now all that‚Äôs left to think about is how easy it is to get to many of the attractions Southern California has to offer!  Thanks again!

Summary: We stayed here the first two nights this hotel opened.  What a gorgeous property! Easily, the best Residence Inn we have ever stayed at and I hope this is what their new concept is.  We stayed two nights with our dog (OK, the pet fee is a bit high, $100 for your total visit so for one night it's crazy expensive).  The rooms are laid out well and are extremely comfortable.  Bed, couch, even a big LCD TV (we normally don't watch TV on vacation) that we used.  Full kitchen for those that need it.  Pool, firepit are fun also.  Just great decor all around.  Staff was some of the best we've ever dealt with plus they LOVED our dog, Nellie, and kept asking for us to bring her to the front desk where she got treats.   Good location and Tustin is a pretty cool little town.   Only negative
Manager Response: Thank you!  Yes, this is it!  Residence Inn Generation 9 design concept is here to stay. We are one of the first in the nation to present the new Residence Inn, and we are definitely keeping the amenities that we‚Äôve become known (one of the reasons those lines do get a little long at times).  We have made some adjustments to the breakfast area, especially when we get busy. Thanks again and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Me and my family stayed here for a stay vacation had the best experience. We stayed the weekend it opened and the employees were great knew what they were doing very helpful and always greeted you with a smile and a hello when you walked thru their door. We stayed in their 2 bedroom suite and it was great very spacious and clean. My kids loved swimming in their pool and then heading over to the basketball court and shooting some hoops and then cooling off in their pool again. We would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: We‚Äôve been told that we are often ‚Äúhopping‚Äù with families and we love it!  We know it can be hard sometimes traveling with everyone, and anything we can do to make it easier is what we are all about.  If you are ever back with us in Tustin, we will be glad to see you!  Thanks again!

Summary: I was here over the weekend. I stayed next door at the Fairfield inn for two days and here for three. This place was sold out one night . Great place. The lounge was really nice and you can tell they put a lot of money in this place. This hotel really was great. The weather was perfect 80 degrees everyday. I just came from Kansas where it was 95 . Beds are really comfortable . I don't have one complaint about this place. They spent a lot of money on the little details on this hotel.  I stay at 50 different Marriott a year on business and this was definitely the cleanest hotel I have stayed at. You don't have a ocean view or anything but I really like it.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a look and we appreciate your kind words!  We look forward to welcoming you back to Tustin soon!

Summary: I am Marriott platinum member and I was really happy with this hotel.  I arrived around 11am on day of check in and they had my room ready early for me. That was really nice. They really went out of there way to be helpful. The lounge was really nice and relaxing. The room I stayed in was great, clean and pretty large. The location on this place is perfect. I don't have a beach view or anything but its really in a great location. I went to the beach one day and it only took 15 to 20 minutes. The final day of my trip I went to downtown Disney and it only took 15 minutes. I have stayed at some of the other Marriotts in the area and they are pretty outdated. I would highly recommend this hotel. It just opened and it was super clean
Manager Response: We are really happy that you enjoyed your stay!  We can‚Äôt say it enough times, but thank you for being a Platinum Member.  We have only been here a short time but we are glad to continue offering the service and amenities that you are used to with Marriott.  Thank you for keeping us informed on what you like and we will be more than happy to continue to make it happen.

Summary: This is a brand new hotel and the quality of cleaning staff is absolutely terrible. I booked 4 nights (Saturday, Sunday, Wednesday, Thursday) while working long hours in town. I checked in very late and went straight to bed. When I woke up in the morning I noticed that the housekeeper had left the used soap (with a hair on it) and shampoo in the shower. There were also long, dark hairs on the bathroom floor. I complained to the housekeeping manager who was very apologetic and assured me the problem would be corrected.  I returned late and noticed the used soap was gone but the hairs were still on the floor. Not only that the shower was dripping and could not be turned off. It appeared the housekeeper noticed that and angled the shower head up rather than notifying maintenance. I
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to comment on your stay.  My sincere apologies for the issues with housekeeping you experienced.  I have followed up with the team and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  We hope to welcome you back soon so you can give us another try!

Summary: I was staying here on business and was wowed.  Brand new hotel was awesome. This place is in a great location. This is located right of the 55fwy. It took me 10 minutes from john wayne airport to get here. I usually stay at the other Residence inn's in the area and will stay here from now on. I love the location and the fact that this place is brand new is a huge plus. The staff was awesome. I would recommend everyone to stay here. I love the marriott brand and this place is great.  I love staying at new hotels and this place is great . Yes i would recommend this hotel to families , business travelers and just about anybody. The price i paid was excellent also. Great value
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for the terrific comments about our hotel!  We are delighted that you enjoyed the new rooms and we look forward to being your #1 choice when you frequent this area.  Thanks again!
